sourcesContent:
<input type="file"
       id="file-input"
       name="file-input"
       accept=".docx"
       (change)='handleFileInput($event.target.files)'>
<label id="file-input-label" for="file-input">{{ text }}</label>
<input type="file" name="file" id="myFile"   (change)='uploadSingleFile($any($event.target).files)' >
